articles.description: Gravita India Ltd., incorporated in the year 1992, is a Small Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 1662.09 Crore) operating in Metals - Non Ferrous sector.
articles.content:
Emkay Global has buy call on with a target price of Rs 380. The current market price of Gravita India Ltd. is Rs 240.75.
